679: This policy contains all the agreements between you and us. Its terms may not be changed or waived except by endorsement issued by us. If a change re- quires a premium adjustment, we will adjust the premium as of the effective date of change accord- ing to the manuals then in use by us. We may revise this policy form to provide more coverage without additional premium charge. If we do this your policy will automatically provide the additional coverage as of the date the revision is ef- fective in your state.
